data.title: I'm a Celebrity's Jamie Lynn Spears: Her age, Instagram, husband
data.meta_description: Fan of Jamie Lynn Spears since she entered the I'm a Celebrity jungle? Then here's everything you need to know about her.
data.text:
We're already at the halfway point of 2023's I'm a Celebrity...Get Me Out of Here, and easily one of the most talked about celebrity campmates this year has been Jamie Lynn Spears.

The younger sister of Britney Spears, best known for her roles on Zoey 101 and Sweet Magnolias, has done her fair share of trials, cried a lot of tears about missing home and shared a few snippets of her life growing up with Britney.

Throughout the show she's spoken briefly about her children and her husband, but what else is there to know about Jamie Lynn Spears' life? What is her Instagram? How old is she? Well here's everything you could possibly want to know about I'm a Celebrity's Jamie Lynn Spears.

How old is Jamie Lynn Spears?

Born on 1st April 1991, Jamie Lynn Spears is 32 years old.

Who is Jamie Lynn Spears related to?

Ok, so unless you have seriously not been paying attention to I'm a Celebrity, Jamie Lynn Spears is the younger sister of icon Britney Spears.

In the last few years their relationship has been difficult with the two often talking about each other on social media and in their memoirs, however as mentioned on I'm a Celebrity, the two appear to be on good terms now.

What movies and TV shows has Jamie Lynn Spears been in?

As well as being the younger sister of Britney Spears, Jamie Lynn is mostly known for her acting roles in numerous TV shows and movies.

Perhaps the role she is best known for is Zoey in Nickelodeon's Zoey 101, which she was the lead on for three years.

Her other most notable role is as Noreen Fitzgibbons in the Netflix drama Sweet Magnolias, which she has starred on all three seasons of.

She's also appeared in the movie Crossroads alongside Britney, and episodes of All That, Miss Guided and Just Jordan.

Who is Jamie Lynn Spears' husband?

Jamie Lynn Spears is married to 41-year-old business owner Jamie Watson, who owns Advanced Media Partners, which is a Louisiana-based communications service.

The couple met following Jamie Lynn's split from ex-boyfriend Casey Aldridge, whom she shares her eldest daughter Maddie with.

Jamie Lynn and Jamie were introduced through a mutual friend and dated on and off for two years before getting engaged in March 2013. A year later the couple got married in New Orleans.

How many children does Jamie Lynn Spears have?

In 2007, Jamie Lynn announced in an interview with OK! magazine that she was expecting her first child, aged 16, with then boyfriend Casey Aldridge, who was 18 years old at the time.

On 19th June 2008, Jamie Lynn gave birth to her daughter Maddie Briann Aldridge and retreated from public life for the next five years to focus on bringing up her daughter.

Jamie Lynn and Casey split the following year and despite rekindling their relationship in August 2010, they ended their relationship again in November 2010.

In 2017, Maddie almost drowned during an ATV accident after accidentally driving into a pond at home. She thankfully survived and was airlifted to a nearby hospital where she remained unconscious in a coma for two days. Maddie woke up and was able to leave hospital five days after her accident.

Jamie Lynn and Jamie have a daughter together too, Ivey Joan Watson who was born in 2018.

What is Jamie Lynn Spears' net worth?

According to Celebrity Net Worth, Jamie Lynn Spears is said to have a net worth of $6million.

Where does Jamie Lynn Spears live?

As mentioned on I'm a Celebrity, Jamie Lynn Spears currently resides in Louisiana with her family.

Does Jamie Lynn Spears have an Instagram account?

She sure does. Jamie Lynn's Instagram handle is @jamielynnspears and she currently has just over 2 million followers.

On her Instagram Jamie posts a lot of pictures together with her family, photos from filming the recent Zoey 101 reunion and the occasional outfit picture.

I'm a Celebrity...Get Me Out of Here continues on ITV1 and ITVX tonight at 9pm
